T02TD1837E:306a-1: sharddha pra la n'a ma sta ba /
T02TD1837E:306a-3: dad pa smra ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa /
T02TD1837E:306a-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//
T02TD1837E:306a-5: nyes pa'i dri ma ma lus bsal //
T02TD1837E:306a-6: yongs dag yon tan tshogs brnyes pa //
T02TD1837E:306a-7: rgyal ba kun gnas khyod nyid zhabs //
T02TD1837E:306a-9: srid pa'i sdug bsngal bsal dka'i me //
T02TD1837E:306a-10: tsha ba nye bar zhi mdzad cing //
T02TD1837E:306a-11: bsod nams tshogs ni ma lus pas //
T02TD1837E:306a-12: thugs ni yongs su rgyas mdzad pa ;
T02TD1837E:306a-13: / khyod kyi yon tan zag med rnams //
T02TD1837E:306a-14: byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi phul //
T02TD1837E:306a-15: 'dod chags la sogs dbang gyur kyang //
T02TD1837E:306a-16: bdag 'dra'i spyod yul ga la lags //
T02TD1837E:306a-17: 'gro ba'i snang ba gzhir gyur pa //
T02TD1837E:306a-18: nyi ma sprin dang bral ba la //
T02TD1837E:306a-19: me khyer nyon mongs dag gis ni //
T02TD1837E:306a-20: snang ba bgyid lta ci zhig 'tshal //
T02TD1837E:306a-21: de lta mod kyi ngag gi tshogs //
T02TD1837E:306a-22: dman pas kyang ni stod bgyid pa //
T02TD1837E:306a-23: bdag gis cung zhig gang smras de //
T02TD1837E:306a-24: mgon la dad pas drangs pa lags //
T02TD1837E:306a-25: lta bas mi ngoms yid 'ong zhing //
T02TD1837E:306a-26: mchog tu sems dpa' stsol mdzad pa //
T02TD1837E:306a-27: srog dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1837E:306a-28: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1837E:306a-29: rab zhi bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i sku //
T02TD1837E:306a-30: su zhig la ni zhi mi bgyid //
T02TD1837E:306a-31: srid pa'i sred pas gdungs pa rnams //
T02TD1837E:306a-32: bcom ldan khyed kyis rtag zhi mdzad //
T02TD1837E:306a-33: yid 'ong mtsho las byung ba yi //
T02TD1837E:306a-34: bdud rtsi dkar po dang 'dra zhing //
T02TD1837E:306a-35: rtag tu de nyid dpal gyis ni //
T02TD1837E:306b-0: mtshan mo'i yon @306b tan dag gis brgyan //
T02TD1837E:306b-1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub padma yis //
T02TD1837E:306b-2: sems can bung ba tshim mdzad pa //
T02TD1837E:306b-3: khyed mthong na ni rtag pa ru //
T02TD1837E:306b-4: dga' mchog su zhig skye mi 'gyur //
T02TD1837E:306b-5: khyed la mngon dad yid 'ong ba'i //
T02TD1837E:306b-6: bde la gnas pa'i sems can la //
T02TD1837E:306b-7: lha yul bud med bzhin gyi mdangs //
T02TD1837E:306b-10: dpag bsam shing gis rnam brgyan zhing //
T02TD1837E:306b-11: yid 'ong thams cad rnyed sla ba'i //
T02TD1837E:306b-12: dga' ba'i tshal la'ang chags mi 'gyur //
T02TD1837E:306b-13: mchog tu sems dpa' skyed mdzad cing //
T02TD1837E:306b-14: lta ngan rab rib sdug po ni //
T02TD1837E:306b-15: shin tu legs par 'joms gyur pa'i //
T02TD1837E:306b-16: bar snang las ni rtags shar ba //
T02TD1837E:306b-17: bdag nyid chen po gang gis mthong //
T02TD1837E:306b-18: des ni gzhan dag lta mi 'gyur //
T02TD1837E:306b-19: lus can khams gsum 'brog dgon ni //
T02TD1837E:306b-20: chen por rtag tu 'khyams gyur cing //
T02TD1837E:306b-21: rtag tu lam mchog las nyams la //
T02TD1837E:306b-22: khyed lam mngon sum ston pa mdzad //
T02TD1837E:306b-23: sems can gyi ni padma'i tshal //
T02TD1837E:306b-24: dam chos 'od zer dra ba yis //
T02TD1837E:306b-25: sad mdzad nyin mor gyur bas na //
T02TD1837E:306b-26: sngon med nyi ma khyod lags so //
T02TD1837E:306b-27: rab dga'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i //
T02TD1837E:306b-28: bdud rtsi gnyis pa khyod lags te //
T02TD1837E:306b-29: rtag tu bdud rtsi'i gnas brnyes pas //
T02TD1837E:306b-30: 'gro ba nyam thag sel mdzad pa //
T02TD1837E:306b-31: nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yis //
T02TD1837E:306b-32: dgra bcom go 'phang thob pa gang //
T02TD1837E:306b-33: khyed kyi yon tan ma 'tshal bas //
T02TD1837E:306b-34: de yang mkhas pas ma lags so //
T02TD1837E:306b-36: srog ni sdug bsngal skyed byed pas //
T02TD1837E:306b-38: snying po khyed sku dran pa lags //
T02TD1837E:306b-39: rgyal sras khyed kyi bsam gtan gyis //
T02TD1837E:306b-40: bdud rtsis rtag tu tshim byed pa'i //
T02TD1837E:306b-41: yid la srid pa'i sdug bsngal ni //
T02TD1837E:306b-42: ma lus brjed de gnas pa lags //
T02TD1837E:306b-43: sku gsung thugs spro 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1837E:306b-44: 'jig rten khams ni tshad med pa'i //
T02TD1837E:306b-45: gti mug gi ni mun bsal ba ;
T02TD1837E:306b-46: / khyed kyis skad cig gcig gis mdzad //
T02TD1837E:306b-47: rang gi ngo bo'i bdud rtsi che //
T02TD1837E:306b-48: skal ldan bde ba btang nas ni //
T02TD1837E:306b-49: rnam rtog bag chags shas che nas //
T02TD1837E:306b-51: chos dbyings ngo bo nyid lags kyang //
T02TD1837E:306b-52: 'jig rten mi shes bsal ba'i phyir //
T02TD1837E:307a-2: bzhugs kyi yang dag nyid kyis min //
T02TD1837E:307a-3: thugs rje'i bdud rtsi btung mchog gis //
T02TD1837E:307a-4: tshim mdzad bde ba rab stsol zhing //
T02TD1837E:307a-5: rtag tu nyams ni sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD1837E:307a-6: sangs rgyas rol mos gar mdzad do //
T02TD1837E:307a-7: gnyis par 'khrul pa las zlog phyir //
T02TD1837E:307a-8: shes rab thabs ni gnyis med mdzad //
T02TD1837E:307a-9: kun du rmongs pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02TD1837E:307a-10: shes rab mchog gi 'od rab gsal //
T02TD1837E:307a-11: rnam thar gsum gyi bde brnyes pas //
T02TD1837E:307a-12: zhal gsum yid du 'ong ba'ang mnga' //
T02TD1837E:307a-13: sbyin sogs pha rol phyin pa drug / legs par brnyes pas phyag drug mnga' //
T02TD1837E:307a-14: shes rab rnon po'i ngo bo bas //
T02TD1837E:307a-15: phyag gnyis dkyil 'khor mchog sbyin mdzad //
T02TD1837E:307a-16: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pas //
T02TD1837E:307a-17: rin chen mchog ni phyag na bsnams //
T02TD1837E:307a-18: mgon po khyod kyi thugs rje yis //
T02TD1837E:307a-19: rtag tu rdo rje padmar ston //
T02TD1837E:307a-20: bde ba'i thabs kyis de thob ces //
T02TD1837E:307a-21: de nyid dga' bdag can la ston//
T02TD1837E:307a-22: yon tan 'byor ba yongs rdzogs pas //
T02TD1837E:307a-23: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa lags //
T02TD1837E:307a-24: dka' ba las ni zlog mdzad pas //
T02TD1837E:307a-25: sems dpa'i skyil krung bde bas bzhugs //
T02TD1837E:307a-26: dngos po'i tshogs ni dbyer med pas //
T02TD1837E:307a-27: khyed bzhugs pa la nges snang ste //
T02TD1837E:307a-28: sku ni rang bzhin dri ma med //
T02TD1837E:307a-29: sna tshogs gzugs su rnam par ston //
T02TD1837E:307a-30: gdul bya sna tshogs sems can don //
T02TD1837E:307a-31: rnam pa gcig gis 'grub pa ni //
T02TD1837E:307a-32: sna tshogs rigs kyi dbye ba yis //
T02TD1837E:307a-33: thugs rje'i gter chen khyed rab mdzes //
T02TD1837E:307a-34: bsam bya khyed las gzhan ma mchis //
T02TD1837E:307a-35: bsam gtan mchog kyang khyed lags pas //
T02TD1837E:307a-36: ma rig mtshan mo'i mun rum na //
T02TD1837E:307a-37: dpag med 'od ldan ston zla khyed //
T02TD1837E:307a-38: srid pa nyid la zhugs gyur kyang //
T02TD1837E:307a-39: srid pa med pa nyid du mdzad //
T02TD1837E:307a-40: srid pa srid med par zhen pas //
T02TD1837E:307a-42: sems can kun la phan dgyes kyang //
T02TD1837E:307a-43: sems can nyer dmigs nyid mi mnga' //
T02TD1837E:307a-44: sgyu ma lta bur gnas mdzad kyang //
T02TD1837E:307a-45: khyed la sgyu ma mnga' ma lags //
T02TD1837E:307a-46: chags sogs dri mas ma gos par //
T02TD1837E:307a-47: sems can chags pa dbang du mdzad //
T02TD1837E:307a-48: khyod ni rang bzhin cher zhi yang //
T02TD1837E:307a-49: bdud rnams 'joms par mdzad la dgyes//
T02TD1837E:307b-0: @307b rang rig nyams su stong ba yis //
T02TD1837E:307b-1: nyon mongs bag chags bcas las rgyal //
T02TD1837E:307b-2: srid dang thar pa'i ro ltar bas //
T02TD1837E:307b-3: ro gcig nyid du khyed kyis mdzad //
T02TD1837E:307b-4: gang zhig dag pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1837E:307b-5: khyed ni rtag tu sgom byed pa //
T02TD1837E:307b-6: des ni 'gro ba rmi lam dang //
T02TD1837E:307b-7: dri za'i grong khyer lta bur mthong //
T02TD1837E:307b-8: des na rnam rtog tshogs kyis ni //
T02TD1837E:307b-9: dri ma rnam par dang bar 'gyur //
T02TD1837E:307b-10: rnam pa kun du skye ba ni //
T02TD1837E:307b-11: rgyu ni nye bar gcod par bgyid //
T02TD1837E:307b-12: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal las zlog ste //
T02TD1837E:307b-13: slar yang smon lam stobs kyis ni //
T02TD1837E:307b-14: sna tshogs tshul gyis rnam gnas shing //
T02TD1837E:307b-15: 'gro ba sdug bsngal ldan rnams skyabs //
T02TD1837E:307b-16: thugs rje'i byin gyis rgyud brlan pas //
T02TD1837E:307b-17: dngos po med las rgyab kyis phyogs //
T02TD1837E:307b-18: bde gshegs sras po ji bzhed pa'i //
T02TD1837E:307b-19: tshul ni rnam pa du mas bzhugs //
T02TD1837E:307b-20: gzhan dag stong pa rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02TD1837E:307b-21: rang rig nyams ni ston par brtson //
T02TD1837E:307b-22: ngal bso'i gnas ni mchog brnyes nas //
T02TD1837E:307b-23: rtag tu bde bas zhugs par mdzad //
T02TD1837E:307b-24: khyed ni mthong ba tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD1837E:307b-25: bzhin ras shin tu dang ba dang //
T02TD1837E:307b-26: spu g-yo mchi mar bcas pa dang //
T02TD1837E:307b-27: lus ni sems med lta bu nyid //
T02TD1837E:307b-28: nges pa kho nar 'byung gyur na //
T02TD1837E:307b-29: gtso bo khyed tshul mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1837E:307b-30: blo yi mig gis mthong ba dag / de yi bde ba smos ci 'tshal //
T02TD1837E:307b-31: ji ltar khyed kyi rnam pa kun //
T02TD1837E:307b-32: mthong ba las ni bder gyur pa //
T02TD1837E:307b-33: de ltar skad cig tsam mthong las //
T02TD1837E:307b-34: bde bar gyur pa yod ma lags //
T02TD1837E:307b-35: kun bdag dbang phyug byed pa dang //
T02TD1837E:307b-36: ngas sprul skyes bu mchog dang ni //
T02TD1837E:307b-37: tshangs pa mchog gi rang bzhin dag /'du shes kun dang rnams bral zhes //
T02TD1837E:307b-38: thar pa las ni phyin ci log / nga rgyal lam gyi rjes 'gro rnams //
T02TD1837E:307b-39: khyed kyi rang bzhin ma 'tshal bas //
T02TD1837E:307b-40: srid pa gsum gyi lam na 'khor //
T02TD1837E:307b-41: srid pa'i sa bon nga rgyal zhes //
T02TD1837E:307b-42: yang dag gsung ba khyed kyi gsung //
T02TD1837E:307b-43: nga rgyal yod na slar yang ni //
T02TD1837E:307b-44: de las las dang skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1837E:307b-45: bdag nga zhes bya dang bral zhing //
T02TD1837E:307b-46: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1837E:307b-47: khyed kyi ngo bor 'dzin shes na //
T02TD1837E:307b-48: rang bzhin gyis ni yang dag snang //
T02TD1837E:307b-49: dang ba bsgom pa la dga' bas //
T02TD1837E:307b-50: rtag tu skad cig tsam gyis snyeg //
T02TD1837E:307b-51: ngan rtog rab rib kyis 'thum pas //
T02TD1837E:307b-52: rmi lam na yang khyed mi mthong //
T02TD1837E:307b-53: zla ba mar ngo'i mun rum na //
T02TD1837E:308a-0: dmus long dag gis nor bu @308a * //
T02TD1837E:308a-2: /'od tshogs shin tu dri ma med //
T02TD1837E:308a-3: lag par gnas kyang mi mthong ltar //
T02TD1837E:308a-4: de bzhin rmongs pa sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD1837E:308a-5: rnam par zhen pas khyed mi mthong //
T02TD1837E:308a-6: bde ba kun gyi gter gyur pa //
T02TD1837E:308a-7: rmongs pa'i blo yis mthong ba dang //
T02TD1837E:308a-8: 'od dang ldan pas mchog gyur pa //
T02TD1837E:308a-9: khyod ni rtag tu mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD1837E:308a-10: ye shes snang ba gsal ba yis //
T02TD1837E:308a-11: dri med mdangs ldan khyod mthong 'gyur //
T02TD1837E:308a-12: gdul bya'i skye bo sna tshogs la //
T02TD1837E:308a-13: thugs rjes yid ni drangs gyur pa //
T02TD1837E:308a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1837E:308a-15: khyed ni tshogs mchog dag tu bstan //
T02TD1837E:308a-17: spros pa rnams dang nyer bral bas //
T02TD1837E:308a-18: bcom ldan khyod ni bstod pa min //
T02TD1837E:308a-19: khyod ni stong las gzhan ma lags //
T02TD1837E:308a-21: sgyu ma lta bu byung gyur pa //
T02TD1837E:308a-22: kun rdzob tu ni de bsngags kyi //
T02TD1837E:308a-23: dam pa'i don du yod ma yin //
T02TD1837E:308a-24: khyed ni dngos min dngos med min //
T02TD1837E:308a-25: gnyis ka ma yin gos pa med //
T02TD1837E:308a-26: yod dang med par spyod pa yis //
T02TD1837E:308a-27: rtog ge'i spyod yul dag las 'das //
T02TD1837E:308a-28: shes rab dam pa la dgyes pas //
T02TD1837E:308a-29: mchog tu zhi ba'i bdud rtsi can //
T02TD1837E:308a-30: 'gyur ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1837E:308a-31: zhi ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02TD1837E:308a-32: / rtag tu kun gyi bdud rtsi rig / kun mkhyen bde bar gshegs pa'i bdag / dpal mchog dang por phyag 'tshal 'dud //
T02TD1837E:308a-34: kun rdzob tu ni tha snyad kyis //
T02TD1837E:308a-35: mkha' dang mnyam pa khyod bstod kyis //
T02TD1837E:308a-36: rnam rtog bral ba khyod la ni //
T02TD1837E:308a-37: bdag 'dras bstad pa byed mi rigs //
T02TD1837E:308a-38: sems can mang po la byams shing //
T02TD1837E:308a-39: thugs rjes thugs ni drangs gyur la //
T02TD1837E:308a-40: byis pa nyes smra lta bu la //
T02TD1837E:308a-41: gtso bo khyod ni bzod par mdzod //
T02TD1837E:308a-42: da ltar thub dbang gco la bstod //
T02TD1837E:308a-43: bsod nams bdag gis gang bsags pa //
T02TD1837E:308a-44: des ni sems can rang rig pa'i //
T02TD1837E:308a-45: bde ba khyed dang 'dra bar shog / dad pa smra ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1837E:308a-47: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a shr'i gupta dang /
T02TD1837E:308a-48: sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts'a ba bande rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
